scripts.network: pnpm build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "pnpm local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm launch"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:happ && nix flake check -L && pnpm -F tests test
scripts.package: nix build -L .#living-power.meta.release -o workdir/living-power.happ && pnpm -F ui package && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.network:android: pnpm build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "pnpm local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri dev" "pnpm tauri android dev"
